SENT.plain: Sneddon's syndrome is a rare neurodermatologic disorder that is manifested by multiple cerebrovascular accidents and livedo reticularis
The authors describe two siblings from one family with Sneddon's syndrome, suggesting autosomal recessive inheritance
The propositus presented with internuclear ophthalmoplegia and ophthalmic artery occlusion
These manifestations as well as the autosomal recessive inheritance have not yet been reported in Sneddon's syndrome
